actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for optometric and medical vision care.

summary.text: Authorizes payment under the Supplementary Medical Insurance program of Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act for eyeglasses and optometric or medical vision care.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for optometric and medical vision care.
